text: Your API keeps timing out when I try to batch process more than 100 records. This is a critical bug blocking our integration.
Getting a 500 error on the /users endpoint since this morning. We need this fixed ASAP — it's blocking our deployment pipeline.
The API rate limiter is broken — we're getting 429 errors well under the documented limits. This is a serious issue.
Anyone else seeing API gateway errors? Our team has been struggling with intermittent 503 errors for two days now.
Thinking of canceling — the pricing changed and I'm not sure the value is there anymore. Need to evaluate alternatives.
Our team is evaluating whether to stay on the current plan. The price increase feels steep for what we're getting.
The cost per seat is getting expensive for our team size. Looking for something more affordable without losing key features.
Feature request: we need webhook support for real-time alerts when critical issues are raised by customers.
When will you add support for custom dashboards? Our team needs to visualize data in ways the current UI doesn't support.
Please add an export-to-CSV option for reports. We require this for quarterly reviews and it's currently missing from the platform.
Feature request: the search is missing advanced filtering options. We need to filter by date range and source type.
Would be great if the UI had dark mode. Our team works late hours and the bright interface is hard to use for long sessions.
The notification system is broken — I'm not getting alerts for critical issues. We need this fixed immediately.
Bug report: the date picker in the reports section is broken on Firefox. Cannot select dates after the 28th of any month.
The search functionality is broken — it returns zero results even for exact matches. Our whole team is frustrated.
We're leaving for a competitor. The missing webhook integration was the final straw — we need real-time data and you don't support it.
Cancelled our enterprise plan today. The feature gaps compared to CompetitorX are just too wide. Switching back to what worked before.
Our team dropped your product after 6 months. The broken API was the main issue — we can't build on something unreliable.
Thinking about switching to an alternative. The product hasn't improved in months and we need better performance and reliability.
Just switched to your platform from CompetitorX and the developer experience is 10x better. Love the API documentation and onboarding.
Just switched to this from our old tool and I love the signal detection. Exactly what we needed for our product workflow.
Would recommend this to any team struggling with feedback overload. The analytics module has been a game-changer for prioritization.
Can anyone recommend a good feedback intelligence tool? We've been looking for something that actually prioritizes real user signals.
This is the 3rd time I'm reporting this issue — the export function crashes on large datasets. We need this fixed urgently.
We've opened 5 support tickets about the same problem with data sync. Cannot get a resolution and it's affecting our entire pipeline.
Frustrated with the lack of response on our API issues. We've been struggling for weeks and the documentation doesn't help at all.
Looking for a better way to track customer feedback across all our channels. Does anyone know a good solution for multi-source aggregation?
The onboarding flow is confusing — I can't figure out how to set up my first project. The UI needs to be more intuitive for new users.
When will API v2 be released? We're evaluating whether to build our integration on the current version or wait for the update.
Can anyone recommend a tool for real-time signal detection? We need something that works across Slack, Intercom, and email channels.
Is this another scam token? The team hasn't shown any real product yet. Need to see proof they're actually building something.
When token launch? Community has been waiting for months. Need a concrete release date or people will leave.
The tokenomics look unsustainable — inflation rate is way too high. This utility model doesn't work long-term for holders.
Rug alert: dev wallet just moved 40% of supply. This looks like a honeypot setup to drain community liquidity.
Just switched to this protocol from the old bridge. The dev experience is solid and they're actually shipping features.
Need to see actual shipping and building before anyone invests. Too many vaporware projects with zero real utility.
When airdrop? Team keeps promising but never delivers. Starting to feel like a scam — other projects are shipping while we get nothing.
This is looking like a drain — no dev update in three weeks. Possible scam. The team is ghosting everyone.
Critical bug in the smart contract — funds could be at risk. Need an immediate audit before this gets exploited by bad actors.
Evaluating whether to hold or dump the token. The use case isn't clear and competitors are building faster than this team.
Looking for a token with real utility in this space. Everything so far has been vaporware with no real product behind it.
Latest dev update: the release looks promising but tokenomics still need fixing. Community wants more transparency from the team.
We need an enterprise solution that handles 10k+ users. Current pricing doesn't scale for our team size at all.
Comparing your platform vs CompetitorX for our Q2 rollout. Need a custom demo showing our specific use case.
Feature request: we're missing SSO integration and it's a must-have for our security requirements. Can't evaluate without it.
The pricing structure is unclear for enterprise buyers. We need a better breakdown of cost per seat before we can approve the purchase.
Evaluating whether to switch to your platform. Can't deal with the broken API on our current tool anymore — need reliability.
Looking for a solution that scales from 50 to 5000 users. What's your pricing model for growth-stage startups?
We dropped CompetitorX because their support was broken. Need better reliability guarantees before we commit to a new vendor.
Cannot get the API to integrate with our SAML provider. This is a critical bug blocking our enterprise pilot evaluation.
When will you add multi-tenant support? Our team requires this for client deployments and it's currently missing from the platform.
Thinking about switching back to our old vendor. The missing reporting features are a dealbreaker for our enterprise clients.
Need urgent help — the data import feature is broken and our trial expires Friday. Can't complete our enterprise evaluation.
Frustrated with the lack of SSO and RBAC features. Our enterprise clients require these and they're missing from the platform entirely.
